replies.txt_content:
标题: 【Tea#3】你的尾巴已送达，请签收 本帖最后由 Because. 于 2016-10-17 21:12 编辑 
嘛，上次




搜狗截图16年10月17日2055_1.png (97.92 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2016-10-17 20:57 上传





于是我就又撸了一个小尾巴预览："I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."[/color][/b]

Gong_Pu 发表于 2016-10-21 23:53

每次回帖输入内容需要5秒，复制小尾巴1秒，加上颜色4秒
每次回帖时限10秒
剩下8秒切换下一个帖子
加上小尾巴不是好看很多么
